name: Gas Station Story (Demo)
description:
Have you ever wanted to work at a gas station in the middle of a desert? One with outdated, slow technology that makes each interaction a chore to complete? No? Well, have you ever wanted to interact with a cast of wacky, lovable characters? Each with their own unique personalities and backstories? Some of which will call you names and treat you like scum just for serving them? Still no? Well I don't know what to tell you, man. That's what I've got here. Take it or leave it. GAS STATION STORY

A futuristic tale of love and yearning, set inside of a 7-Elev//// I mean, uh, 8-Fifteen! Your convenient neighborhood pitstop! A frequent destination for travelers both local and inter-planetary, where you can find pretty much anything your heart desires.

- Experience a plethora of endings (10+)!

- Explore very little of a sci-fi world, almost entirely limited to your place of employment!

- Enjoy 5 days spent with a charming cast of characters, including (but not limited to):

Frogman!

Alien in a hoodie!

This guy!

- Featuring: Graphics! Save Function! Some Music! Dialogue! Violence! Drug Usage! Crippling depression! Alternate endings! Alcohol! Secrets! MORE DIALOGUE!

(Anticipated Release: 2023)

 <><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

CONTROLS:

A = Z

B = X

Start = Enter

Select = Shift

Movement = WASD // Arrow Keys

 <><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

(Demo version contains the first two levels of the story and a few secrets. Approximately 20-35 minutes to finish. Second level is currently unfinished and being updated, and some character portraits are still being added.)
